name: Radman
short_description: Radman is a package of Bash scripts designed to automate mp3 broadcasting on Linux. Features are: console/web interfaces, daily (or at some time) playlist/song changing, song search etc. Scripts use Shoutcast broadcast server sc_serv and player sc_trans.
